data: We left Don Quixote wrapped up in the reflections which the music of the enamourned maid Altisidora had given rise to.
The History of Don Quixote, Volume 2, Part 32
Cervantes Saavedra, Miguel de, 1547-1616; Dor√©, Gustave, 1832-1883 [Illustrator]; Ormsby, John, 1829-1895 [Translator]
